name: Carrot Heist
description:
This Giraffe loves carrots but these rabbits do not want to share! Play as our hungry giraffe and collect as many carrots as possible before angry rabbits swarm you! 

Download this FREE mini-game that will keep you wanting to play again! These rabbits will stop at nothing to keep you, a carrot-loving giraffe, from collecting as many carrots as you can!
